alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Crittenden; Lyon (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:53PM EDT until July 24 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN...NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL AND NORTH CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES... At 253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marion, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Spotters reported quarter sized hail 1 mile west of Marion at 252 pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marion, Eddyville, Creswell, Farmersville and Fredonia. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 70 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
